00023 #include "Emma-API.h"
00024 
00025 #define LED0 5
00026 #define LED1 6
00027 #define LED2 7
00028 
00029 enum {
00030   PWM0,
00031   PWM1,
00032   PWM2,
00033   PWM3
00034 };
00035 
00036 RESSOURCE_LIST_LOAD(ressources_list);
00037 
00038 // Declaration of the ressource
00039 RESSOURCE_INIT(led0);
00040 RESSOURCE_INIT(PwmLed0);
00041 
00042 void setLed0(int val){
00043   if(val) HARDWARE_DIGIT_SET_UP(PORTB, LED0);
00044   else    HARDWARE_DIGIT_SET_DOWN(PORTB,LED0);
00045 }
00046 
00047 int getLed0(){
00048   return (HARDWARE_DIGIT_GET(PORTB, LED0) != 0);
00049 }
00050 
00051 void setPwmLed0(int val){
00052   HARDWARE_PWM_SET(PWM1,val);
00053 }
00054 
00055 int getPwmLed0(){
00056   HARDWARE_PWM_GET(PWM1);
00057 }
00058 
00059 RESSOURCES_INIT(){
00060   HARDWARE_PWM_INIT();
00061 }
00062 
00063 // Connection between the driver API and the REST API
00064 RESSOURCES_LOADER(){
00065 
00066         RESSOURCE_UNIT(led0,boolean);
00067         RESSOURCE_GET(led0,&getLed0);
00068         RESSOURCE_SET(led0,&setLed0);
00069 
00070         RESSOURCE_UNIT(PwmLed0,%);
00071         RESSOURCE_SET(PwmLed0,&setPwmLed0);
00072         RESSOURCE_GET(PwmLed0,&getPwmLed0);
00073 }
